Okay,

I have thought about the subspace pocket thing. What I am going to do
is this. Go ahead and do what you will with the provisions you are
having Tuscon hand out now.

BUT!

From this point foward, unless your character's function involves
transport, and when I say function, I mean the part of your bio that
lists function, then your subspace pocket is just that - a pocket. It
is basically the size of a transformer sized gym bag. You can carry
your weapons, maybe a padd or two, A book and a few small odds and
ends. But things should be related to your actual function in one way
or another. IE: A medic could pull out medical supplies, a mechanic
would have tools, a thief would have lock picks ect. However a thief
should not be pulling out specialized mechanics tools that used to
belong to wheeljack 2 centuries that he preserved for just such an
occasion, unless it has been stated in advance.

The sub space pocket is NOT suppose to be this huge area that you can
carry everything, and like a ladies big tote bag that carries
everything but the kitchen sink :)

What this does is it keep the characters interacting. The characters
are suppose to need each other and depend on each other. or at least
RP together to get what they need. And it is unfair that one character
can pull from subspace whatever is needed withou ever stating they
packed it there and having no reason for it being there except that
they need it now. It short circuits the play.

To use an example if you have a sniper running for his life and he all
of a sudden starts pulling out grenades and bombs and such, then what
is the use for the person who's function is bomber? And why would a
sniper have such things, since his fuction involves long ranged
attacks? Now if the character were to state, and I pick up a few
grenades just in case, then it would make sens.

Does this make sense, can you see what I am aiming at?

So again, please feel free to hand out supplies as you need, this is
what i am going with from this point foward.

I hope I make sense, cause I am typing this out fast so I can get some diner.

TTYL

- Preston

On 8/11/11, Sandy Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> Actually, Tucson is distributing an emergency supply for now but they will
> need more.  By the way, Straight Shot is finding a new friend among the
> enemy.  Waspinator is the only bot comparable to her size, since she is a
> bit smaller than him.  Sort of like Silverbolt and Black Arachnia. They
> became lovers.  This time, Straight Shot is finding out that Waspinator is a
> great bot to talk to.  She hopes to keep the friendship a secret from
> Rodimus and Leo but they may find out eventually.  Which makes for a nice
> side story.
